title: BigCommerce web designer
job_overview:
We are building our website and need a  skilled BigCommerce web designer or front-end developer to help improve the layout and functionality of our site. The goal is to enhance the shopping experience, make the interface cleaner and easier to use, and streamline the bulk ordering process across several product types.
- General Layout & Styling Improvements
- Bulk Add-to-Cart Functionality
- Minor tweaks to theme

Tell us:
A little about your BigCommerce experience
What you’d focus on first if given access to our site
(Optional) Links to relevant past work

Send a very short email with a 1-2 minute video where you tell me a bit about yourself and your bigcommerce experience. Make sure the subject of the email includes the word "Duran".
